NIH临床试验检查登革热的研究治疗美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）支持的临床试验正在测试一种实验治疗方法，旨在帮助遭受蚊子传播病毒疾病登革热的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/nih-clinical-trial-trial-examines-investigational-therapy-therapy-forer-dengue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/nih-clinical-trial-trial-examines-investigational-therapy-therapy-therapy-therapy-therapy-forder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6CE0F232-794A-4658-910C-F1F1F1F73820C227 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 07:08:00 -0500 NIH clinical trial examines investigational therapy for dengue
单剂量的抗体屏蔽严重的H5N1流感美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）科学家及其同事报告说，在病毒暴露之前进行的单剂量中和抗体（BNAB）可保护猕猴免受严重的H5N1禽流感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/single-dose-of-antibody-shields-macaques-from-severe-h5n1-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/single-dose-of-antibody-shields-macaques-from-severe-h5n1-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f7d1f31f31-2dc3-4fd2-bd65-1a8591c19e8b Tue, 11 Feb 2025 07:00:01 -0500 Single dose of antibody shields macaques from severe H5N1 influenza

研究表明，老年人无残疾生活的改善根据一项在档案中发表的新的全国代表性研究，在日常生活活动中发现了65岁及65岁以上没有残疾的美国成年人（包括记忆，听力，视觉和功能障碍或局限性），发现了很大的改善。发现老年病学和老年医学和发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-shows-improvement-in-disability-free-fore-life-for-for-for-for-for---- americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-shows-improvement-in-disability-free-fore-life-for-for-for-for-for---- americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6681D3F7-3771-406C-A488-C16492A5C233 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 06:15:26 -0500 Study shows improvement in disability-free life for older Americans
研究发现精神分裂症患者的躁狂症状很大在著名的基因组新闻研究报告中，塞萨洛尼基亚里士多德大学的研究人员发现了精神分裂症谱系障碍（SSD）患者的躁狂症状很大，提供了有价值的见解，可以重塑治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-uncovers-a-simentificant-presence-presence-of-manic-symptoms-incymptoms-in-schizizizophrenia-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-uncovers-a-simentificant-presence-presence-of-manic-symptoms-incymptoms-in-schizizizophrenia-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=342C9B43-537A-4C6D-B022-B022-8A14B56978EB Tue, 11 Feb 2025 06:10:55 -0500 Study uncovers a significant presence of manic symptoms in schizophrenia patients
